loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
This is Beatrice, she is married and has three children, one of which is below fifteen years of age. They all live in a four bedroom apartment in Bamenda.  She has faced many challenges in life like: sickness, an accident, inadequate finance to start up a business and the death of family members.
With this new loan she has requested, she will invest in buying more chicks for her farm, feed, seedlings like beans, yams, maize, coca yams and increase stock at her store of sweets, bread, and biscuits. She holds a positive view of this business succeeding because she has been doing it for a long time and the demand for chickens is high. She has regular customers because her  store has a great location. In addition, the manure from the chickens will be used on the farm to increase yield. With this business activity, the community will benefit from manure which will be used for farming, reduced transportation costs for her nearby clients and the availability of chickens for people to buy for special occasions. 
With the profit from this loan, she will cater to her family's needs, ensure her children's quality education, expand her provision store, invest in her poultry farm and also save some money to undertake bigger investments. She prefers loans form GHAPE because of the low interest rates, convenient repayment intervals and also the borrowers are trained in marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed. Also, social needs of members are met at GHAPE.

loans.use: To buy items such as biscuits, bread, sweets, seedlings and chickens for her farm

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
This is Patience, she is married and is a mother of six children, with one of them below the age of fifteen. They all live in a three bedroom apartment in Bamenda, Cameroon.  She has faced many challenges in life like: inadequate finance to start up a business, sickness and educating her children. With this new loan she has requested she will invest in her business by buying different brands of drinks in bulk as well as cups, tables, chickens and feed for her farm.
She thinks this business will succeed because, she has been doing it for a long time. The business has a good location which is great for her customers. In addition to that, the demand for chickens is high due to the increasing population.
With this business activity, the community will benefit because transportation costs will be reduced for clients as they will not have to travel far for a drink, it will also help to create unity among the patrons and build a team spirit among them in this place to spend time together. With the profit from this loan, she will invest back into her business and take care of her children’s education and health.
She prefers loans form GHAPE because of the low interest rates, convenient repayment intervals and also the borrowers are trained in marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed. Also, social needs of members are catered for at GHAPE.

loans.use: To buy different brands of drinks as well as tables, cups, feed and chickens for her farm

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es:
María Julia es una mujer luchadora, con muchos sueños, muchas ambiciones positivas en la vida las cuales poco a poco ha sabido enfrentar ya que ella no solo se las ha propuesto a cumplir para salir adelante si no como un reto que debe de enfrentar y tomar para cumplirlo y no dejar las ideas en la nada.  Ella tiene 33 años de edad es casada y madre de 4 hijos de los cuales tres estudian y apoyan a sus padres en las actividades del campo y un menor aun en lactancia, ama de casa y agricultora por tradición. Ella no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar por lo que diariamente trabaja muy fuerte para que sus hijos no pasen por la misma situación que ella en su juventud. El terreno que ella y su familia trabaja está en la misma área donde está ubicada su casa de habitación por lo que la asistencia y mantenimiento es más fácil y más constante.  
Sus sueños como madre de familia son los verlos convertidos en profesionales, sentirse orgullosa del esfuerzo que ella y su esposo hacen para que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida, un mejor futuro y mejores oportunidades de las que ellos pudieron tener. Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado un financiamiento con el cual pretende comprar fertilizantes, abono, foliares, entre otros que darán una mejor protección a sus cultivos y un mejor follaje.
texts.en:
María Julia is a determined woman, with many dreams and many positive ambitions in her life. Little by little she has figured out how to tackle them, so that now her ambitions are not only to get by, but also to challenge herself to achieve more and not to leave her ideas unfulfilled. 

She is 33 years old, is married, and is the mother of four children. Of these, three go to school and help their parents in the field, and the youngest is still breastfeeding. She is a homemaker and farmer, following her family tradition. María Julia did not have the opportunity to study, and so she works very hard every day so that her children do not have to suffer the same situation as she did when she was young. The land that she and her family work is located in the same area as their house, which makes it easier to constantly tend and maintain it.

Her dreams as a mother are to see her children become professionals, and to feel proud of the effort that she and her husband make so that their children have a better life, a better future, and better opportunities than they themselves had. For this reason she has sought a loan with which she hopes to buy fertilizers, manure, and other inputs that will give a better protection to her crops and help produce better foliage.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Ruziboy

texts.ru: Рузибой живет и работает в районе Гиссар. Все свободное время проводит на работе. У него имеется мельница, на которой измельчает муку. Потом он сдает мешки муки оптом в магазины. Он занимается этой деятельностью уже 7 лет. В данный момент Рузибою 28 лет, он не женатый и не имеет детей. Рузибой может позволить себе пропадать на работе. Но он хочет поменять жизнь и обзавестись семьей. Сейчас его мельница сломалась и чтобы отремонтировать он просит кредит. Когда мельница будет отремонтирована, Рузибой приступит к работе. Он усердно работает и в будущем хочет расширить свой бизнес. Он планирует купить еще одну новую мельницу и открыть мучной магазин. Тогда у него будет достаточно денег, чтобы жениться и обеспечивать свою будущую жену и детей, о которых он так мечтает.
texts.en:
Ruziboy lives and works in the Gissar region of Tajikistan, grinding and selling sacks of flour wholesale to various stores for the past 7 years.  He is a bit of a workaholic and spends all his free time working, but would like to eventually settle down and make time for raising a family; he is currently 28 years old, unmarried and without children.    

Recently, his flour-grinding machine broke down; to repair it, he is seeking a loan.  As soon as his flour grinder is repaired, he will be able to start working again.  He works very hard, and hopes to expand his business in the future by buying another flour grinder and opening his own flour store.  By doing so, he will be financially secure enough to get married and provide for his future wife and children; to have the family he has been dreaming of.

loans.use: repair his flour grinder

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio de 48 años de edad  vive en casa de un familiar con sus dos hijos de 13 y 11 años de edad, el  se dedica al cultivo y comercialización de plantas a través un vivero que tienen en su lugar de residencia desde hace 9 años, tiene mucha clientela fija que lo buscan por los buenos precios con que vende su mercadería, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, don julio esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, tierra negra, bolsas, semillas y todos los utensilios necesarios para seguir  con su trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Julio is 48 years old, and he lives at a relative's house with his two sons, who are 13 and 11 years old. Julio works in a plant nursery that opened in his home 9 years ago, and he has a lot of regular clients who keep coming back because of the good prices offered; with the income Julio is able to cover some of the house expenses.

Now Julio is requesting this loan to buy compost, topsoil, bags, seeds and the necessary tools to continue to perform his job and to increase his income to provide a better quality of life for his children, without any constraints.

loans.use: to buy compost, topsoil, bags, seeds and tools.

loans.name: Eva Yolanda

texts.es: Eva  de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de sal por mayor y menor en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee clientela fija que la buscan por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, doña Eva esta solicitando a integral un préstamo para comprar más sal por quintales para poder seguir con su negocio que le ha generado buenas ganancias y asi darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: 68-year-old Eva lives in her own house with her family. For several years she has made a living by selling salt wholesale and at retail prices in the market near her home. She has fixed clientele who come to her for her good prices. She manages to settle her household expenses with the profits from her work. Eva is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to purchase quintals of salt so she can continue with her business, which has generated good profits for her, and thereby give her family greater economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase more quintals of salt

loans.name: Josefa Nuvia

texts.es: Josefa Nuvia habita en un barrio pobre de Managua, tiene varios años de ser comerciante minorista de ropa, calzado y muchos más productos. Ella cubre la mitad de los gastos de su familia, especialmente la educación de su hija de 16 años de edad, su esposo trabaja largas jornadas como operador de un autobús y juntos han construido las bases para el futuro de su familia.  Doña Josefa solicita el crédito para comprar y ofrecer más y nuevos productos a sus clientes como: ropa, zapatos, carteras de dama y cosméticos. Ella siempre tiene pedidos que cumplir que le permite respaldar su crédito con AFODENIC.
texts.en: Josefa Nuvia lives in a poor neighbourhood of Managua. She has had a small business selling clothes, shoes, and many other products for several years. She covers half her family’s expenses, including the education of her 16-year-old daughter. Her husband works long days as a bus operator. Together they have built a foundation for the future of their family. Josefa is requesting the loan in order to purchase and offer more new products to her clients, such as clothes, shoes, ladies’ handbags, and cosmetics. She always has orders to fill, which allows her to back her loan with AFODENIC.

loans.use: to purchase and offer more new products to her clients, such as clothes, shoes, ladies' handbags, and cosmetics

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, él es un hombre  emprendedor y luchador. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su lugar de  residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Mario lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Mario esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de  más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su esposa.
texts.en: 56-year-old Mario lives in his own house with his partner. He is an enterprising and determined man. Several years ago he decided to set up a small business in his home. The business consists of a small shop that he has managed to keep for several years with great effort and dedication. He has a lot of customers, since the customers are the most important thing to Mario. He always attends to them with a smile and is very friendly, which, in addition to always having what the clients are looking for, is why he has gained the confidence of many in the area. Mario is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to invest in his small store and stock it with all types of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent, and other products the clients want. He trusts that in this way he will manage to have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent, etc

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi  Luz Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socios emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Milagro mujer de 38 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos de 18, 17 y 7 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva ambulante en el mercado de de su comunidad desde hace 6 años, sus hijas le ayudan a vender. Tiene un año de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo está solicitando para  comprar mercadería nueva por docena como es blusas, camisas, faldas, shores, pantalones, toallas, brasieres, blúmeres, bóxer. Marta mujer de 48 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas y Miguel hombre de 39 años su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three enterprising, dedicated members, one of whom is Milagro. She is 38 years old, married, with three children ages 18, 17, and 7 years old. For the past six years her business has been new clothing sales in the community market, and her daughters help her with the sales. 

She has been a client of the institution for one year. She is requesting a loan to buy new merchandise by the dozen such as blouses, shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, towels, bras, panties, and boxers. 

Marta, age 48, has a business is selling fruit, and Miguel, age 39, has a business is selling vegetables.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise by the dozen such as blouses, shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, towels, bras, panties, and boxers.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Mariela tiene 32 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 10 y 2 años, su negocio es la venta de muebles y tamua desde hace 4 años, sus productos los comercializa en un tramo en el mercado de artesanía de Masatepe y en su casa. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 4 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de tamua como es arroz, carne de res, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla. Geydi mujer de 25 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de comida y Orlando hombre de 27 años su negocio es la venta de productos lácteos.
texts.en:
This group has three micro-entrepreneur members, one of whom is Mariela. She is 32 years old, in a relationship, and has two children who are 10 and 12 years old.  For four years she has worked selling furniture and tamua. Her products are sold in a section of the artisan market in Mastepe, as well as in her house.  She has been a client of the institution for 4 years, and has requested a loan to buy raw material to make tamua, a dish filled with rice, beef, tomato, bell pepper and onion.  

Geydi is a 25-year-old woman who works in the business of selling food, and Orlando is a 27-year-old man whose business is selling dairy products.

loans.use: to buy raw material to make tamua, a dish of rice, beef, tomato, bell pepper and onion.

loans.name: Reintegracion Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cinco mujeres dedicadas al comercio una de ellas es  María Elena mujer de 45 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 17 y 11 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, perfumes y zapatos desde hace 10 años, es cliente de la institución desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar mercadería de ropa nueva como pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, shores, perfumes de Avon y Zermat, zapatos de varón y mujer, chinelas de hules, sandalias. Concepción mujer de 66 años su negocio es la venta de materiales de costura, Aura mujer de 67 años de edad su negocio es una librería en su domicilio, Ingrid mujer 43 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de ropa y costura y Ligia mujer de 41 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tortillas.
texts.en: The group consists of five women who work in trade and commerce. María Elena is 45 years old, married and with two children aged 17 and 11. She has worked buying new clothing, perfumes and shoes for the last 10 years and has been a member of the institution for 5 years. She needs the loan to purchase new merchandise such as pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts, Avon and Zermat perfumes, men and women shoes, rubber flip flops and sandals. Concepción is 66 years old and she works selling sewing supplies. Aura is 67 years old and works in a library in her house. Ingrid is 43 years old and works selling clothing and sewing. Ligia is 41 years old and works selling tortillas.

loans.use: buy new merchandise like pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts, Avon and Zermat perfumes, men and women shoes, rubber flip flops and sandals.

loans.name: Flor De Reseda Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres mujeres microempresarias una de ellas es Heissell mujer de 31 años de edad, casada, con cinco hijos, su negocio es un taller de zapatería  desde hace 8 años, tiene cuatro trabajadores que le elaboran el calzado. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materiales como suelas, brasil, forro, cerquillos, etc. María mujer  de 31 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa y Yaritza  mujer de 35 años se dedica a la venta de comida y tiene una pulpería.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial women.  One of them is Heissell, a 31-year-old married woman with five children.  For eight years her business has been a shoe workshop, which has four workers who make footwear.  The loan is necessary for buying materials like soles, leather, lining, fringes, etc.  

María is a 31-year-old woman who sells clothing, and Yaritza is a 35-year-old woman who sells food and has a convenience store.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make shoes such as soles, leather, lining, fringes, etc.

loans.name: Armonia Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios microempresarios exitosos uno de ellos es Arlen mujer de 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre, tiene un hijo, su negocio es  la venta de gaseosas y refrescos  desde hace 4 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de cajillas de gaseosa de diferente tamaño y sabores y compra de frutas para elaborar los refrescos tales como papaya, granadilla, naranja, melón, piña, etc. Ana mujer de 34 años de edad su negocio es la venta de verduras y Juan hombre de 66 años su negocio es la venta de pinol, pinolillo y cereal.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful small business owners.  One of them is Arlen, a 30-year-old woman in a common-law marriage.  She has a child.  For four years her business has been selling soda and drinks; she has been a client of this institution for three years. The loan requested is for buying cases of soda of various sizes and flavors, and for buying fruits to make the soft drinks such as papayas, passion fruit, oranges, melons, pineapple, etc.

Ana is a 34-year-old woman whose business is selling vegetables, and Juan is a 66-year-old man whose business is selling the traditional cornmeal and cacao-based drinks pinol and pinolillo, as well as cereal.

loans.use: To invest in buying fruits such as papayas, passion fruit, oranges, melons, pineapple, sugar, dyes, etc.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María es una mujer microempresaria de 31 años, soltera, con tres hijos de 9, 6 y 1 año, su negocio es la elaboración de zapatos por encargo  desde hace 10 años, su papa es quien se encarga de elaborar el calzado. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de la institución  El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materiales como suelas, forros, cerquillos, cuero, hilo, etc.
texts.en: María is a woman who owns a small business. She is 31 years old, single, with three children aged 9, 6 and 1. It has been her business to make custom shoes for 10 years. Her father makes the shoes. She has been a client of the institution for 4 years. She needs the loan to buy materials like soles, linings, welts, leather, thread, etc.

loans.use: to buy prime materials like soles, welts, leather, thread etc.

loans.name: Linda Vista Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro mujeres emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Urania tiene la edad de 30 años, vive en unión libre, su negocio es una sastrería desde hace 5 años. Tiene a dos personas que le ayudan a armar y elaborar los pantalones de colegio, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de tela al por mayor para elaborar pantalones estudiantil. Jannette tiene 32 años su negocio es una pulpería y venta de fritanga los fines de semana, Johana tiene 28 años su negocio es la venta de comida y Sofía tiene 41 años su negocio es la venta de zapatos.
texts.en:
This group is composed of four enterprising and persistent women. One of them is Urania, 30, who lives in a common-law marriage. She has had a tailor’s shop for five years, helped by two employees who prepare and finish school pants.

Urania is requesting a loan to buy fabrics in bulk to make school pants. The remaining members are Jannette, 32, who has a grocery store and sells fried food during the weekends; Johana, 28, who sells food; and Sofía, 41, who sells shoes.

loans.use: to buy fabrics in bulk.

loans.name: Getsemani Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Dominga mujer  de 48 años de edad,  soltera, su negocio es la venta de comida desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como es tortillas, carne de res, carne de pollo, arroz, sal, achote, cebolla, chiltoma, hueso de res, yuca, repollo, ayote, chayote, para la elaboración de sopa de res, tacos y enchiladas. Martha mujer de 43 años de edad, se dedica al negocio de la venta de zapatos y María Elvira mujer de 70 años su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising businesswomen.  One is Dominga.  She is 48 years old, single, and has had a business selling food for one year.  She needs this loan to buy basic materials such as tortillas, beef, chicken, rice, salt, onion, bones, yucca, cabbage, vegetable pears, and more, in order to make beef soup, tacos, and enchiladas.  Matha is 43 years old and has business selling shoes, while 70-year-old María Elvira runs a grocery store out of her home.

loans.use: to buy basic materials such as tortillas, beef, chicken, rice, salt, onion, bones, yucca, cabbage, vegetable pears, and more, in order to make beef soup, tacos, and enchiladas.

loans.name: Poder De Dios Group

texts.es: María es una de las tres integrantes del grupo tiene la edad de 28 años, casada, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de perecederos desde hace 6 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de canasto de plátanos y frutas como aguacate, tamarindo,naranja al por mayor. Georgina tiene la edad de 44 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de pan en Diría, Diriomo y Niquinohomo desde hace 4 años y Elsa tiene 58 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de comida y frutas desde hace 10 años.
texts.en:
María is one of the three members of the group. She is 28-years-old, married, and has a son under her care. She has been selling perishable items in her business for 6 years. She has been a client of the institution for 7 years. She is asking for a loan to purchase an inventory of crates filled with bananas and fruits such as avocado, tamarind, and orange at wholesale.

Georgina is 44-years-old and has been working at the business selling bread in Diría, Diriomo, and Niquinohomo for 4 years.

Elsa is 58-years-old and has been working at the business selling food and fruits for 10 years.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of crates filled with bananas and fruits such as avocado, tamarind, and orange at wholesale.

loans.name: Martha Lorena Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias trabajadoras una de ellas es Patricia mujer de 43 años de edad, casada, su negocio es taller de zapatería, donde su esposo le ayuda a elaborar el calzado y ella posteriormente lo va a vender a Diría, Diriomo y a la comarca Palo quemado  desde hace 5 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materiales como suelas, cerquillos, cuero, Brasil,  para elaborar sandalias de plataforma, zapatos cerrados para hombre. Marta  mujer de 54  años de edad se dedica al negocio de vender cosa de horno y nacatamales y Claudia mujer de 30 años su negocio es la venta de zapatos para niños y sandalias.
texts.en:
The group consists of three microentrepreneur working members. One of them is Patricia who is a 43-years-old woman and married. Her business is a shoemaking workshop where her husband helps her develop footwear. She will then later sell it in Diría, Diriomo and the Palo region which she has been doing for 5 years. The requested loan is for the purchase of materials such as soles, visors, and leather to make platform sandals and closed shoes for men.

Marta, a 54-year-old woman works at the business selling corn cakes and Nicaraguan tamales.

Claudia is a 30-year-old woman who sells children's shoes and sandals for her business.

loans.use: to buy materials such as soles, visors, and leather to make platform sandals and closed shoes for men.

loans.name: Las Crucitas Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios  de negocio uno de ellos es Sebastiana tiene la edad 39 años, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, tiene una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 15 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años lo cual demuestra que es una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, trigo, purina, gaseosa, frijoles. Ysabel  tiene la edad de 64 años se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado de Masaya desde hace 40 años y Leonardo tiene la edad de 44 años se dedica a comercializar frutas.
texts.en:
The group consists of three business partners. One of them is Sebastiana who is 39-years-old along with two children under her care. She has had a grocery store located at her home for 15 years. She has been a customer of the institution for 7 years. This shows that she is a very responsible person paying her dues. The loan requires her to purchase bulk grains like rice, sugar, oil, wheat, purine, soda, and beans. 

Ysabel is 64-years-old and has been working selling fruits at the Masaya market for 40 years. 

Leonardo is 44-years-old and also works selling fruits.

loans.use: to purchase bulk grains such as rice, sugar, oil, wheat, purine, soda, and beans.

loans.name: La Paz Centro Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por cuatro mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es Anielca tiene la edad de 36 años, acompañada, con cuatro hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, tortillas, tamales pisques desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de materia prima como es hojas, mecates, maíz, leña, achote, papa, arroz, carne de cerdo,  dulce, etc.  Marta mujer de 46 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas y güirilas, Antonia tiene 61 años  su negocio es la crianza de cerdo y venta de cosméticos y Gissela  tiene la edad de 33 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de cobertores, sobre camas y fundas.
texts.en: This group is made up of four hardworking women.  Anielca is one of them and is 36 yeas old, married and has four children.  She sells nacatamales, tortillas, tamales, and has done so for five years.  She is asking for this loan to buy corn husks, cords, corn, firewood, achote, potatoes, rice, pork, sugar, etc.  Marta is 46 years old, and sells tortillas and guirilas.  Antonia is 61 years old and raises pigs and sells cosmetics.  Gissela is 33 years old and sells blankets, bed covers, and pillow cases.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: La Hermita Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Mayra tiene la edad de 25 años, casada, su negocio es un taller de zapatería desde hace 6 meses, tiene tres trabajadores particulares que elaboran el zapato. El crédito lo está solicitando para mejoras del negocio y compra de  materiales como suelas, cerquillos, Brasil, cuero, pega, hilo, etc. Nelson hombre de 25 años su negocio es la venta de condimentos y  hace servicios de albañilería y María mujer de 43 años su negocio es loa venta de nacatamales.
texts.en: This group consists of three enterprising members.  Mayra, one of the members, is 25 years old and is married.  Her business, which she has had for six months, is making shoes.  She has three employees who make the shoes.  Mayra requests a loan to make improvements to her business and to buy materials such as soles, welts, glue, thread, and leather, including Brazilian leather.  Nelson, 25, sells seasonings and works in construction.  Maria, 43, sells nacatamales [corn, meat, and rice wrapped in banana leaves].

loans.use: to make improvements to her business and to buy materials such as soles, welts, glue, thread, and leather, including Brazilian leather

loans.name: Corazon Valiente Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres  trabajadoras una de ellas es Antonia  mujer de 47 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de productos varios desde hace 13 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario como cajillas de gaseosas, coca cola, Pepsi, big cola, ron plata, etc. Angela tiene 31 años su negocio es la venta de derivados del maíz como yoltamal, elote cocido y Angélica tiene la edad de 21 años su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking women.  Antonia is 47 years old, married, and she has been selling merchandise for 13 years.  She is asking for this loan to buy cases of soft drinks, Coca Cola, Pepsi, Big Cola, Plata rum, etc.  Angela is 31 years old and sells corn products such as yoltamal and cooked corn.  Angelica is 21 years old and has a store.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Candelaria Group

texts.es: Ileana es una de las tres integrantes del grupo tiene la edad de 65 años, viuda, su negocio es la costura desde hace 40 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materiales como botones, telas, agujas, hilos, zippers, etc. María Magdalena tiene la edad de 56 años  su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada  y Erlinda mujer de 54 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon desde hace un año.
texts.en: Ileana is one of the three members of the group. She is 65 years old, a widow, and she has been making her living sewing for 40 years. She needs the loan to buy materials such as buttons, fabric, needles, threads, zips and so on. María Magdalena is 56 years old, she makes her living selling new and used clothes, and Erlinda is a 54-year-old woman whose business for the last years has been the sale of Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy materials such as buttons, fabric, needles, threads, zips and so on.

loans.name: Los Comerciantes Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios luchadores uno de ellos Luisa tiene la edad de 31 años, acompañada, su Negocio es la venta de ropa en su domicilio desde hace 2 años, El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería como pantalones de varón, pantalones de mujer, pantalones de niños, sandalias, blusas y camisetas. Miriam mujer de 45 años su negocio es la venta de CD y DVD  y Luis tiene 53 años se dedica al negocio de vender ropa usada.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking membrs.  Luisa is one of them and is 31 years old and married.  She has had a business selling clothing out of her house for the past two years.  She needs this loan to buy merchandise such as men's, women's, and children's pants, sandals, blouses, and t-shirts.  Miriam is 45 years old, and sells CDs and DVDs, and Luis is 53 years old and sells used clothing.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Rosas Del Valle Group

texts.es: Este grupo  lo forman cuatro socias trabajadoras de negocio una de ellas es Andrea mujer de 33 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores, su negocio es la venta de especie desde hace  9 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de especie como achote, canela, mostaza, salsa inglesa, manzanilla, algodón. Lesbia tiene la edad de 25 años su negocio es la venta de  especies, Ileana tiene 28 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de cosméticos de Avon y Dora tiene 64 años de edad se dedica a la venta de verduras desde hace 20 años.
texts.en: This group is made up of four members who are business women, one of whom is Andrea, a 33-year-old woman who is married and has two young children.  Her business for the last nine years has been in the sale of spices. She is seeking the loan to buy items such as achiote, cinnamon, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, chamomile and cotton. Lesbia is 25 years old, she makes her living selling goods, Ileana is 28 years old and she sells Avon cosmetics while Dora, 64, has been making her living selling vegetables for the last 20 years.

loans.use: to buy items such as achiote, cinnamon, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, chamomile and cotton.

loans.name: Te Agradesco Señor Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias de negocio  una de ellas es Yessenia tiene la edad de 23 años, soltera, con un hijo en camino, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 4 años, conforme a lo que le ha financiado la institución ha ido creciendo su negocio y ha podido surtir más su pulpería. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de granos básicos  como arroz, azúcar, café presto, café toro, aceite, chiverías, gaseosas, queso, crema, etc. María tiene la edad de 62 años su negocio es la elaboración de hojas y venta de nacatamales y Rosa tiene 51 años y su negocio es la venta de repostería de piña y ropa.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three business woman, one of whom is Yessenia, she is 23 years old, she is single and is expecting a baby. Her business for the last four years is a grocery store located in her home. In accordance with the communal bank has financed, she has expanded the business and been able to stock more in her grocery store. She is seeking the loan to buy bulk grains such as rice, sugar, coffee, espresso, oil, snacks, fizzy drinks, cheese, cream and so on. 

María is 62 years old and her business is the sale and produce of Nicaraguan tamales, and Rosa who is 51 years old makes her living selling pineapple pastries and clothes.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains such as rice, sugar, coffee, espresso, oil snacks, fizzy drinks, cheese, cream and so on.

loans.name: Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socios trabajadores uno de ellos es Jerald  tiene la edad de 29 años, casado, con un hijo menor bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de ropa, cosméticos y bisutería  desde hace 15 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de inventario como perfumes de damas, perfumes de varón, boddy, pulseras, aretes, anillos, cadenas, collares, blusas, camisas, pantalones de varón, de dama y de niño. Martha tiene la edad de 48 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos desde hace 5 años, Dulce tiene la edad de 51años su negocio es comerciante de calzado desde hace 7 años y Pantaleón tiene la edad de 54 años su negocio es un taller de carpintería desde hace 5 años.
texts.en: This group is comprised of 4 hardworking members, one of whom, Jerald, is 29 years old, married, and has one little boy in his care. His business is selling clothes, cosmetics, and costume jewelry and he has been doing this for 15 years. He is requesting a loan to buy inventory such as women's perfumes, men's cologne, bracelets, earrings, rings, chains, necklaces, blouses, shirts, and men's, women's, and kid's pants. Martha is 48 years old and she has been selling cosmetics for 5 years. Dulce is 51 years old and she has been selling shoes for 5 years.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as women's perfume, men's cologne, bracelets, earrings, rings, chains, necklaces, blouses, shirts, and men's, women's and children's pants.

loans.name: Santa Martha Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres integrantes emprendedores una de ellas es Jazmina mujer de 33 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de ojuela ambulante desde hace 20 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años, en lo cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable. El crédito lo está solicitando para  para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de ojuelas como harina, aceite,leña, bolsa, papel de envolver,plastico transparente, azucar, canela, etc. Lidia mujer de 38 años su negocio es artesanía en textil  y María  mujer de 34 años su negocio es la venta de ojuela ambulante.
texts.en: This group is comprised of 3 enterprising members, one of whom is Jazmina, a 33 year old woman who has a partner and 4 children in her care. Her business is selling hojuela pastries in the street, and she has been doing this for 20 years. She has been a member of the Institution for 7 years during which time she has shown herself to be a responsible person. The loan that she is requesting will be used to by raw materials for making the hojuelas such as flour, oil, wood, bags, wrapping paper, transparent plastic, sugar, cinnamon, etc. The other members are Lidia, a 38 year old woman who makes textile crafts and María, a 34 year old woman who sells hojeulas in the street.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making baked goods called hojuelas such as flour, oil, wood, bags, wrapping paper, transparent plastic, sugar, cinnamon, etc.

loans.name: Felicidad Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios microempresarios de éxitos uno de ellos es Mariana mujer de 33 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos menores bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de ropa y bisutería desde hace 10 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año, El crédito lo solicita para la compra de mercadería de ropa como pantalones de varón, pantalones de damas, camisas, camisetas, blusas, shores, aretes pequeños, aretes grandes, pulseras, anillos, cadenas, collares, aros, etc. Juan hombre de 53 años su negocio es un taller de carpintería y Nora mujer de 61 años su negocio es la venta de pan, sopa y nacatamales.
texts.en: This group is comprised of 3 successful micro-enterpreneurs one of whom is Mariana, a 33 year old woman who is single and has 2 small children in her care. Her business is selling clothes and custom jewelry, and she has been doing this for 10 years. She has been a member of the Institution for 1 year. She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as men's pants, women's pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, small earrings, big earrings, bracelets, rings, chains, necklaces, hoops, etc. Juan is 53 year old man with a carpentry workshop and Nora is a 61 year old woman whose business is selling bread, soup, and a local type of tamale.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as men's pants, women's pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, shorts, small earrings, and large earrings, bracelets, rings,  chains, necklaces, hoops, etc.

loans.name: Delicias Del Valle Group

texts.es: Yeri es una de las tres integrantes del grupo tiene la edad 26 años, casada, su negocio es la venta de fresco y repostería  desde hace 1 año, el crédito lo requiere para diversificar su negocio como es la compra  de mercadería  de ropa nueva como pantalones de varón, pantalones de damas, shores, camisetas, camisolas, blusas, faldas, camisas  otra de las integrantes es María tiene 28 años se dedica al negocio de la venta de cosméticos de Avon y Antonia tiene 45 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada.
texts.en: Yeri is one of three members of the group and she is 26 years old, married, and her business is selling fresh drinks and pastries. She has been doing this for 1 year. She needs the loan to diversify her business by buying inventory of new clothes such as men's pants, women's pants, shorts, t-shirts, camisoles, blouses, skirts, shirts. Another of the members is 28 year old María who sells cosmetics from Avon, and Antonia is 45 years old and has a business selling second-hand clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes such as men's pants, women's pants, shorts, t-shirts, camis, blouses, skirts, and shirts.

loans.name: Guard Barranco Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Sonia mujer de 38 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es el destace de cerdo en pie y venta de derivados del mismo como nacatamales, fritos, chicharrón desde hace 5 años. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para la compra Cerdo en pie y compra de materia prima para la elaboración de nacatamales como hojas, mecates, leña, arroz, papa,chiltoma, cebolla,tomate, etc. Blanca mujer de 33 años su negocio es una pulpería y Sandra mujer de 42 años su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members. One of them is Sonia who is 38 years old, in a relationship, and has two children. Her business since five years back is butchering pigs and selling pork derivative products such as nacatamales, deep fried snacks, and fried pork rind. 

She has been a client of this institution for four years. She is requesting the loan in order to buy pigs and ingredients for nacatamales such as banana leaves, string, firewood, rice, potatoes, pepper, onion, tomatoes, etc. 

Blanca is 33 years old and her business is a corner store. Sandra is 42 years old and her business is selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making nacatamales

loans.name: Luz Del Esfuerzo Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas María mujer de 58 años de edad, casada, con 5 hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de detergente desde hace 4 años, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de Jinotepe, Es cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar productos como papel higiénico Scott, jabón de lavar trastes, jabón de lavar ropa ámbar, pasta dental, ace por bolsón, cloro por bolsón, cajas de sobres de shampoo, etc. Vilma mujer de 59 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas y nacatamales y Martha mujer de 31 años su negocio es la venta de detergente, jabon de baño, pasta dental, cloro, jabon de lavar ropa, jabon de lavar trastes.
texts.en:
This group consists of 3 entrepreneurial partners, one of them is María, 58 years old, married and mother of 5 children. During the last 4 years, she has been selling detergent in bulk at the market in the city of Jinotepe. María has been a member of the organization for 6 years. She is requesting this loan to buy products such as toilet paper, dish soap, laundry detergent, tooth paste, powder detergent in bulk, bleach in bulk, boxes of shampoo sachets, etc.
 
The other members of the group are Vilma and Martha. Vilma is 59 years old and she sells tortillas and “nacatamales” (steamed meat and vegetable pastries, cooked in banana or maize leaves), while Martha is 31 years old, and she sells detergent, bath soap, tooth paste, bleach, laundry detergent and dish soap.

loans.use: to buy products such as toilet paper, dish soap, laundry detergent, tooth paste, powder detergent in bulk, bleach in bulk, boxes of shampoo sachets, etc.

loans.name: Socorro Del Carmen

texts.es: Socorro es una mujer emprendedora de 51 años de edad, casada, su negocio es una  pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 11 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 10 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas, este crédito lo está solicitando para compra de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles crudos, jabón de olor, jabón de ropa, papel, gaseosa variadas, sopa maggi, cafe, detergentes, cloros, shampoo, carne de pollo, carne de res, etc.
texts.en:
Socorro is an enterprising woman, she is 51 years old and married. Her business since 11 years back is a corner store located in her home. She has been a client of the institution for 10 years, and during this time she has proven to be responsible in making her repayments.

She is requesting this loan in order to buy grains such as rice, sugar, oil, beans, scented soap, washing detergent, paper, various soft drinks, Maggi soups, coffee, detergent, chlorine, shampoo, chicken, beef, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, beans, soap, washing detergent, paper, soft drinks, soups, coffee, detergent, chlorine, shampoo, meat, etc

loans.name: Nubia Auxiliadora

texts.es: Nubia es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene la edad de 27 años, casada, con cuatro hijos, su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado oriental de Managua desde hace 5 años, lleva de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de frutas y verduras como elote, chilote, yuca, mango, quequisque, etc.
texts.en: Nubia is a very hard working person, she is 27 years old, she is married and has 4 children. During the last 5 years, she has been selling fruits and vegetables at the Mercado Oriental in Managua. Nubia joined the organization one year ago, and the loan that she is requesting now will be used to buy fruits and vegetables such as corn, cassava, mango, taro root, etc.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as corn, cassava, mango, taro root, etc.

loans.name: Anibal Lorenzo

texts.es: Aníbal es un hombre luchador de 56 años de edad, casado, su negocio es la venta de ropa interior  desde hace 20 años En el mercado de Masaya, El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería de ropa interior como bóxer, calzones, calcetines, camisolas, bikinis, medias, brasieres, etc.
texts.en: Aníbal is a very hard working man, he is 56 years old, he is married, and his business during the last 20 years has been the selling of lingerie at the market of Masaya. The loan that he is requesting is to buy merchandise such as undergarments for men and women, socks, nightshirts, bikinis, stockings, brassieres, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as undergarments for men and women, socks, nightshirts, bikinis, stockings, brassieres, etc.

loans.name: Reyna Marbelly

texts.es: Reyna es una joven de 23 años, acompañada, con un hijo menor de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva desde hace 10 años, tiene a una trabajadora particular que le ayudan a vender la mercadería.  El crédito lo está solicitando para comprar uniformes y pantalones escolares a por mayor, ropa de adulto y de niño como pantalones, camisas, camisetas, blusas, faldas, shores, etc.
texts.en:
Reyna is a 23-year-old young woman who is in a relationship, and has a child who is a minor. Her business has been the sales of new clothing for 10 years. She has an individual worker who helps her to sell the merchandise.

She is requesting the loan to buy school uniforms and pants wholesale, as well as adult and children’s clothing, such as pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts, etc.

loans.use: to purchase school uniforms and pants wholesale, as well as adult and children's clothing, such as pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Manuel De La Trinidad

texts.es: Manuel hombre emprendedor y trabajador de 67 años de edad, casado, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas desde hace 30 años, El crédito lo está solicitando para comprar cosecha de mamon, jocote y aguacate.
texts.en:
Manuel is an enterprising and hard-working man aged 67, he is married and has one child. His business since 30 years back is to buy and sell fresh fruits.

He is applying for this loan in order to buy fresh fruits such as papaya, hog plums, and avocado.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits such as papaya, hog plums, and avocado

loans.name: Araceli De Los Angeles

texts.es: Araceli tiene la edad de 34 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de Tipitapa desde hace 4 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 4 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable . El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de frutas y verduras como zanahoria, papaya, granadilla, ayote, quequisque, cebolla, chiltoma, papa, etc.
texts.en: Araceli, 34, is in a common law marriage and has a business selling fruits and vegetables in the Tipitapa market. She has had this business for four years. She has also been a member of this institution for four years. During this time, she has proven to be a responsible person. She is requesting this loan to buy fruits and vegetables such as carrots, papaya, passion fruit, pumpkin, taro, onion, sweet peppers, potatoes, and more.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as carrots, papaya, passion fruit, pumpkin, taro, onion, sweet peppers, potatoes, and more.

loans.name: Marixza Del Socorro

texts.es: Marixza es una mujer muy luchadora de 40 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es el destace de cerdo en pie desde hace 6 años, tiene a un ayudante particular que le ayuda al destace. Lleva un año siendo cliente de la institución.  El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un frízer y comprar cerdo en pie.
texts.en: Marixza is a very hard working woman, she is 40 years old, and a single mother of one. During the last 6 years, her business has been the butchering of pigs, with the support of a helper who assists with the butchering. She joined the organization 1 year ago, and the loan that she is requesting now is to buy a freezer and pigs.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and pigs.

loans.name: Issa

texts.en: Issa is a 21-year-old single young man from Bethlehem city. He lives with his family in a simple house. For the past four years, Issa has been working in a meat store making a very low wage. This is the only source of income for his family. Issa has a disability in his leg due to the war. Issa would like to open a small store for his father to sell fruits and vegetables in the market. It is a good business and will help them cover part of the family's expenses. Issa took a 500 USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy some fruits and vegetables to resell in the local market. Issa appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy some fruits and vegetables to resell in the local market.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo es un hombre muy trabajador de 68 años de edad, casado, se dedica al negocio de la agricultura  desde hace 51 años, siembra pujagua y maíz tiene a una persona que le ayuda al proceso para  posteriormente ir a venderlos al mercado de Masaya, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 13 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable. El crédito lo requiere para comprar materiales y llevar a cabo el producto terminado  como pagar al mozo, desgranar, comprar sacos.
texts.en: Gerardo is a very hardworking man. He is 68 years old, married, and has worked in agriculture for 51 years old. He grows pujagua corn and corn. He has someone who helps in the process to later sell his crops in the Masaya market. He has been a client of the institution for 13 years and has shown himself to be a very responsible person. He needs the loan to buy materials and prepare the product by paying the laborer, removing the grains, and buying bags.

loans.use: to buy materials and prepare product by paying the laborer, removing the grains and buying bags.

loans.name: Las Vencedoras Group

texts.es: Yeymi es una de los cuatro socias que conforman al grupo tiene la edad de 28 años, acompañada, su negocio es una mini pulpería, venta de ropa usada, venta de café y pan en el mercado de granada  desde hace 3 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra pacas de ropa usada como pantalones, camisas, toallas, vestidos  y juguetes. Sara mujer de 35 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería,  María mujer de 48 años su negocio es una pulpería y Leyla mujer de 27 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon y una mini pulpería.
texts.en:
Jeymy is one of the 4 members of this group, she is 28 years old, lives with her partner and during the last 3 years she has been running her own grocery store. Jeymy also sales second-hand clothes, coffee and bread at the market in Granada. She joined the organization 1 year ago, and the loan that she is requesting now is to buy second hand bundle clothing such as pants, shirts, towels, dresses, and also used toys.

The other three members of the group are Sara, Maria and Leyla. Sara is 35 years old and she owns a small grocery store; Maria is 48 years old and owns a home-based grocery store, while Leyla, 27 years old, sales Avon cosmetics and as her partners, she also runs a small grocery store.

loans.use: to buy second hand bundle clothing such as pants, shirts, towels, dresses, and also used toys.

loans.name: Rios De Agua Viva Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socios  trabajadores uno de ellos es Socorro mujer de 39 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva desde hace 6 años, sus productos los comercializa ambulante y en su comunidad, el crédito  lo requiere para comprar mercadería al por mayor como pantalones de damas, camisetas, blusas, faldas, sandalias, pantalones de varón, etc. María tiene 32 años se dedica al negocio de la compra y venta de cerdo, Alicia tiene 37 años su negocio es la compra y venta de cerdo y Santiago tiene la edad de 31 años su negocio compra y venta de repuesto de moto taxi y tiene una moto taxi que da a trabajar.
texts.en: The group is made up of four hardworking members. One of them is Socorro, a 39 year old woman. She is married and her business has been selling clothes for 6 years. She sells her clothes as a street vendor in her community. She needs the loan to buy merchandise wholesale, such as women's pants, shirts, skirts, sandals, men's pants, etc. María is 32 years old and works buying and selling pigs. Alicia is 37 years old and works buying and selling pigs, and Santiago is 31 and works buying and selling motorcycle taxi replacement parts and has a motorcycle taxi that he works as well.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale such as women's pants, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, sandals, men's pants, etc.

loans.name: Tengo Fe Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Meyling tiene la edad de 28 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de frutas desde hace 3 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año, El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de frutas  como granadillas, naranjas, melón, calala, banano, tamarindo,Pitahayas, pipianes, etc. Reyna mujer de 24 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras, María tiene 48 años su negocio es la elaboración de artesanía de barro y Petrona tiene 45 años su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: The Tango Fe group consists of four hardworking partners, one of whom is 28-year-old Meyling. Meyling has sold fruit for three years and has been a client of the lending institution for a year. Meyling is applying for a loan to purchase additional inventory: grenadines, oranges, melons, passion fruits, bananas, tamarind, dragon fruits, pipians, and other fruits. Twenty-four-year-old Reyna and 45-year-old Petrona also sell fruits and vegetables. María is 48 years old and runs a business making clay handicdrafts.

loans.use: to purchase inventory: grenadines, oranges, melon, passion fruit, bananas, tamarind, dragon fruit, pipians, and other fruits.

loans.name: Mana Group

texts.es: Grupo Formado por tres socios emprendedores,  Nelson tiene 32 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una mini pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario para el negocio como cuadernos, lapiceros, pan, sopa magi, maruchan, azúcar, aceite, arroz, gaseosa. Ingris  joven de 21 años su negocio es compra y venta de cosechas y Marlene mujer de 24 años su negocio es una mini pulpería, venta de gaseosa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hardworking members, one of them is Nelson, who is 32 years old, lives with his partner and their two children. He owns a home-based convenience store that he opened a year ago. Nelson is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise for his store, such as notebooks, pens, bread, instant soups, noodles, sugar, oil, rice and soft drinks. 

The other two members of this group are Ingris and Marlene. Ingris is 21 years old and her business is the buying and selling of crops, while Marline, who is 24 years old, runs a small grocery store and sells soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his convenience store, such as notebooks, pens, bread, instant soups, noodles, sugar, oil, rice and soft drinks.

loans.name: Las Uvas Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Mayra tiene 31 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de platanitos, enchiladas, gaseosas, chiverías  ambulante desde hace 3 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de materia prima como plátanos, aceite, leña, bolsas, repollo, meneítos, caramelos, galletas, gaseosas. Belqui  tiene 19 años su negocio es la venta de gaseosas y Juana  mujer de 52 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members. One of them is 31-year old Mayra who is married and has had a business peddling bananas, enchiladas, soft drinks, and nicknacks for three years.

She is seeking a loan to buy more merchandise such as bananas, oil, firewood, bags, cabbage, cheese puffs, candy, cookies and soft drinks.

19-year old Belqui sells soft drinks. 52-year old Juana sells perishables (fruit and vegetables).

loans.use: buy bananas, oil, firewood, bags, cabbage, cheese puffs, candy, cookies and soft drinks

loans.name: Prosperidad Y Bonanza Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socias trabajadoras una de ellas es Katia tiene la edad de 25 años, soltera, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio, venta de ropa y cosméticos desde hace año y medio, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra  de perfumes, boddy,  pantalones de damas, blusas, shores, bolsos Y mejoras para su vivienda. Claudia mujer de 41 años su negocio es la venta de ropa, Ligia tiene 43 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos  y Scarlett tiene 28 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y ropa.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 4 hard-working members. One of them is Katia. She is 25 years old and single. Her business is a small store which is incorporated into her house where she sells clothing and cosmetics. She has done this for the past year and a half. Katia is requesting this loan to buy perfume, body creams, woman's pants, blouses, shorts, bags and make improvements to her house.

Claudia is 41 years old and she sells clothes. Ligia, 43 years old, sells clothing and shoes. Scarlett is 28 years old and she sells cosmetics and clothes.

loans.use: to buy perfume, body creams, woman's pants, blouses, shorts, bags and make improvements to her house.

loans.name: Cielo Azul Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios  emprendedores y dedicados al trabajo uno de ellos es Yokasta  tiene la edad de 47 años, soltera, su negocio es la venta de bolsos artesanales  desde hace 3 años, El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de materia prima como 50 yardas de tela, 40 yardas de zipper, 8 libras de forro, 4 docenas de reguladores platicos, cuerina, etc. Humberto hombre de 32 años su negocio es la venta de pantalones, zapatos y sandalias y Carla mujer de 30 años de edad su negocio es la venta de miel me sabe
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising and hardworking members. One of them is Yokasta. She is 47 years old, single, and has had a business making and selling bags for three years. She is seeking a loan to buy supplies such as 50 yards of fabric, 40 yards of zips, 8 lbs of lining, 4 dozen plastic fasteners, leather, etc.

Humberto is 32 years old and sells pants, shoes and sandals; Carla is 30 and sells honey.

loans.use: buy fabric, zips, lining, fasteners, leather etc.

loans.name: Jazmin Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios microempresarios luchadores uno de ellos es Eduardo tiene la edad de 56 años, casado, con un hijo a su cargo, su negocio prestar servicios de fontanería desde hace 8 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materiales de trabajo como tubos, varillas, pega,llaves, químicos para destaquiar y limpiezas de  inodoros. María mujer de 61 años su negocio es la venta de comida  y Martin  hombre de 51 años de edad su negocio es la venta de leña.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three entrepreneurs who are fighters. Eduardo is one of them. He is 56 years old, married with one dependent son. His business is providing plumbing services. He has done this for 8 years. He has been a member of ADIM for 3 years. Eduardo has requested a loan to buy working materiel like tubing, rods, glue, fittings, drain cleaner and toilet cleaner.

Maria is a 61 year old woman. She sells food. Martin is 51 years old and sells wood.

loans.use: to buy working materiel like tubing, rods, glue, fittings, drain cleaner and toilet cleaner.

loans.name: Claudia Urania

texts.es: Claudia es una mujer emprendedora de 33 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería que tiene ubicada en su domicilio desde 1 año, El crédito lo está requiriendo para la compra de cosméticos como desodorantes, perfumes, ropa de niños, gaseosas, arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, golosinas etc.
texts.en: Claudia is a 33 year old  enterprising woman. She is married with three children under her care. She has had a small store located in her house for the past year. Claudia is requesting a loan to buy cosmetics like deodorants and perfume, children's clothing, soft drinks, rice, sugar, oil, beans, sweets, etc.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics like deodorants and perfume, children's clothing, soft drinks, rice, sugar, oil, beans, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: Karla es una mujer emprendedora de 33 años, casada, con tres hijos, su negocio es elaboración de ropa de artesanía como maxi, güipil, vestidos de niñas, etc. desde hace 15 años, tiene a 3 personas que le ayudan en la elaboración del producto. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de tela  dacron, hilo, seda, cintas de mantequillas, encajes, etc.
texts.en: Karla is a resourceful woman aged 33, she is married and she has three children. She creates handicrafts clothes such as maxis (long dresses), güipiles (woven ponchos), clothes for young girls. She has been engaged in this activity for 15 years and she can count on the help of 3 people in preparing her products. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy Dacron thread, thread, silk, measuring tapes and lace.

loans.use: To buy Dacron thread, thread, silk, measuring tapes and lace.

loans.name: Los Claveles De San Blas Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socias trabajadoras una de ellas es María mujer de 46 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la compra y venta de cosecha desde hace 10 años, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado oriental. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosechas de pipían y jocotes. Blanca joven de 21 años su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas, Meragna tiene 31 años su negocio es la venta de frutas y Elizabeth joven de 18 años su negocio es venta de pollo.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 4 hardworking members.  María is one of these members and is 46 years old and married.  Her business is buying and selling produce and she has been doing it for 10 years.  She sells her goods in a market.

The loan that she is asking for is to buy pipían and jocote.  The other members of the group are Blanca (who is 21 years old and also works selling produce), Meragna (who is 31 years old and sells fruits and vegetables), and Elizabeth (who is 18 years old and works selling chicken).

loans.use: buy pipían (a local chile) and jocote (a local fruit) to sell.

loans.name: Alejandro Isabel

texts.es: Alejandro  es un señor de 69 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una panadería ubicada en su domicilio  desde hace 13 años, sus hijos mayores le ayudan en la elaboración de los diferentes tipos de pan como amasar y a hornear. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para mejoras a su panadería y compra de harina por quintal.
texts.en: Alejandro is 69 years old, he is married and he has two children. He has been running a bakery located in his house for 13 years, and his older children help him with the different stages of the production process, such as kneading and baking. He has been a member of the institution for 5 years, and he is requesting a loan to make improvements to his bakery and to buy flour by the kilo.

loans.use: To make improvements to his bakery and to buy flour by the kilo.

loans.name: Tano Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios emprendedores luchadores uno de ellos es Estanilao hombre de 65 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la agricultura  y transportista desde hace 8 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de abono para la siembra de una manzana de maíz y una manzana de pipían. José hombre de 30 años su negocio es la compra y venta de cosecha de tamarindo y Teresa mujer de 36 años su negocio es la venta de pinol y pinolillo
texts.en:
The group is made up of three enterprising and determined members.

One of them is Estanilao, 65, who's married and has two children in his care.  For eight years his business has been farming and transportation.  He needs the loan to buy soil amendments to plant one manzana of corn and one of pipian peppers.

José, 30, buys and sells tamarind crops and Teresa, 36, sells "pinol" and "pinolillo" [traditional beverages made with toasted maize].

loans.use: to buy soil amendments

loans.name: Las Tres Madres Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias de negocio una de ellas es Maryery tiene la edad de 23 años, acompañada, con tres hijos menores, se dedica a la venta de artesanía desde hace 1 año, sus productos los comercializa a honduras. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de jarrones pequeños, hamacas, zapatos de varón y otros. Ivania mujer de 27 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y calzado  y Alicia mujer de 44 años su negocio es la venta de fritanga y sopa.
texts.en:
This group comprises three businesswomen, including Maryery.  Maryery is 23 years old, married, and has three young children.  She has worked selling handicrafts for 1 year.  She sells her goods in Honduras.

She needs this loan to buy small vases, hammocks, mens' shoes, and other things.  Ivania is another group member, is 27 years old, and works selling clothes and shoes.  Alicia is also a member of the group, is 44 years old, and works selling fried food and soup.

loans.use: buy small vases, hammocks, mens' shoes, and other things.

loans.name: Kenny Rogers

texts.es:
El joven Kenny de 32 años de edad es casado, tiene dos hijos que dependen de él, tiene casa propia, vive con su esposa en la ciudad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, sus hijos tiene edades entre 05 años y 02 años,.
Kenny  se dedica al negocio de pulpería en la que vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, sus clientes le prefieren porque ahí encuentran de todo para uso familiar, también vende ricos refrescos  de todas las clases y sabores.
 Kenny es un joven emprendedor que está luchando con su negocio ya que el tenia un empleo el cual fue despedido y al ver la necesidad que tenía de salir adelante con su familia emprendió este negocio y le va bien. 
Kenny está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de frijoles, azúcar, arroz, manteca, café, pollo, frescos, cosméticos, medicinas y churros  ya que la demanda es muy buena y desea aprovechar la época para comprar por mayor el producto y lograr de esa manera más utilidades, está muy contento de seguir trabajando con PRISMA.
Kenny su sueño es mejorar  su casa y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras-  Septiembre del 2013.
texts.en:
Kenny is a young adult, 32 years old, married, he has two dependent children and his own house. He lives with his wife in the city of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. Their children are 5 years and 2 years old.

Kenny has a grocery store where he sells everything related to household goods. His customers like to buy in his store because there they find everything the family uses and Kenny also sells delicious soft drinks of all kinds and flavors.

Kenny is a young entrepreneur who is working hard with his business. He had a job which he lost and, as he saw the necessity to get by with his family, he opened his store and it is going well.

Kenny is asking for a loan to buy beans, sugar, rice, lard, coffee, chicken, beverages, cosmetics, medicines and donuts because the demand is very good and he wants to take advantage this season to buy the goods wholesale and by this make more profit. He is very happy to continue working with PRISMA.

Kenny's dream is to improve his home and his business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - September 2013

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, rice, lard, coffee, chicken, beverages, cosmetics, medicines and donuts for his store.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet 22-year-old Fatmata from Waterloo 2 Eastern area in Freetown. She is married with one child aged 2 years old. In 2012 Fatmata established her slippers business, because she needs to earn income to support the home. She works at the business 12 hours per day and 7 days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are lack of enough capital to expand her business and price inflation.

Fatmata requires a loan in order to buy more plastic slippers and shoes to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and establish a permanent business location. In the future, Fatmata plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more plastic slippers and shoes to expand her business.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is a widow living with her six children in a five bedroom apartment house in Bamenda, Mezam Division of the North West Region of Cameroon.  She has been faced with many difficulties in life including inadequate capital to finance her business, accidents, sickness, and worst of all the death of her husband.

She has taken and successfully repaid her four previous loans. With the new loan she has requested she will expand her farm output by buying farm seedlings, pesticides, and fertilizer for her farm. She has positive expectations for her business, because she has been doing it for a long time and has regular customers who buy her farm produce. She has a good business location where she sells her farm output. With her increased output, the community will benefit from a regular supply of food at greatly reduced prices.

With the profit from this loan, she will take care of her family's needs by providing them with medical care and education. She will renovate her house and support her young ones in their education.  She prefers loans form GHAPE because of the low interest rates offered, convenient repayment intervals, and the business management education provided before loans are disbursed.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pesticides, and farm seedlings

loans.name: Yeabu

texts.en:
Meet 46-year-old Yeabu from Waterloo Eastern area in Freetown. She is married with 4 children. In 2003, Yeabu established her wood business. She began her business because she needs to earn income to support the home. She works at the business 12 hours per day and 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the poor road network.

Yeabu requires a loan in order to buy more wood to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and have a vehicle to transport her goods. In the future, Yeabu plans to expand her business to become a big provision shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more wood to expand her business.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a single man. He describes himself as honest. 

He operates a store where he sells cooking pans and jikos (charcoal stoves). He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in a suburban area and his primary customers are retailers. He describes his biggest business challenge as lack of enough funds to boost business. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more jikos to sell. His business goal is to open a distributor store within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will get married and  meet his family's needs. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more jikos to sell.

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is a widowed woman with four school aged children. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is household consumables.

For the past one year, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbors and passersby. The major challenge she faces is the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Costa

texts.en:
Costa, a single mother of three children, has been a client of Ugafode for four years now. She started taking loans when her first daughter began in secondary and needed money to pay for her tuition. She also needed to increase her herd of cows such that she could get more profits and therefore raise more income to meet her family needs. 

Costa is hard-working and says she will continue getting loans from Ugafode until her children have finished school. She buys and raises cows for a period of 3-6 months and then sells them when they have fattened at a higher price. She wants this loan for the same purpose. She thanks Ugafode because the quarterly repayment system is so favorable for her business.

loans.use: To buy cattle for fattening

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 34 years old, living in Kagashe, Rukungiri Municipality. He is married with two children who both attend school. His main source of income is the motorcycle taxi business (motorcycle for hire services). He started this business in 2007 and has managed to gain from it tremendously. He started building his house early 2012 with the available savings he had at the time and motorcycle earnings but later realized that he could not finish that house with only the savings.

Francis decided to request a loan from UGAFODE Microfinance Limited (MDI) in order to finish the house. With this loan he is going to finish his house and his family will be able to live in decent housing. He hopes that, when it is done, he will be able to address other issues in his family, such as taking his children to better schools and providing for their needs. He faces the challenge of weather in his motorcycle business, especially in rainy seasons and when there is a lot of sunshine which hits him when he is waiting for customers.

loans.use: To complete his house

loans.name: Tukolerewamu Group

texts.en:
Sauda is a female aged 44, a single mother of 4 who are attending school. She belongs to Tukolerewamu Group and deals in selling new clothes in different weekly markets in the outskirts of the city.

She began this business in 2003 to earn a living for her family. Since she had attended school, she had some ideas about the business which further motivated her. She is a very hardworking woman and has managed to cater for her family needs single handedly.

loans.use: to buy clothing for selling

loans.name: Adah Serah

texts.en:
Adah Serah is single with three children, and they all live in a three-bedroom house in the Bamenda Mezam division of Cameroon. She has faced so many challenges in life, including inadequate finances to enable the smooth functioning of her business, the death of her relative and other loved ones and inadequate finances to educate her children along with sickness in her family.

Adah Serah has successfully repaid her previous loans and says with the new loan requested, she will expand her petty trading by buying bread, sweets, soft drinks and poultry as well as pay for her rent of the market space. Adah Serah believes this  business will succeed because she has been doing it for a long period of time and as such has experience in the business. She has a good business site with increasing demand from her customers and with this increase in capital, Adah Serah will make sure to meet her customers' demands and at greatly reduced prices. With this business activity, the community will have a regular supply of her commodities at greatly reduced prices with discounts also given to regular customers.

With the profits from this business, Adah Serah will be able to expand her business, provide all the necessary materials and textbooks needed for her children's education, enable the consumption of three square meals to her family and provide medication to her family. Adah Serah prefers GHAPE loans because of the low interest rates and the convenient repayment intervals. Additionally, the members are educated on business management techniques before the loans are disbursed to assist in the proper management of the loan.

loans.use: To buy bread, soft drinks, bottled water, sweets, drugs and poultry.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Meet 48-year-old Adama from Waterloo2, in the eastern area in Freetown. She is married with four children. In 2010, Adama established her palm oil business. She began her business in order to be able to generate her own source of income. She works at the business from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m., seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is insufficient capital to expand her business.

Adama requires a loan in order to purchase more palm oil to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Adama plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Ya Alimamy

texts.en:
Meet 50-year-old Ya Alimamy from Waterloo, in the eastern area of Freetown. She is married with three children. In 2003, Ya Alimamy established her wood business.
